Source: Reuters

Description: Shares of electric vehicle start-up Rivian soared Wednesday to a market valuation that's bigger than Ford and General Motors, leading Gerber Kawasaki managing partner Hatem Dhiab to take a pass on the stock at these levels.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3kmScbO
